', u"   echo '  Require all granted' >> /etc/httpd/conf.d/", u'WPDirectory', u'.conf

', u'fi

#!/bin/bash -xe
ln -s /usr/bin/pecl7 /usr/bin/pecl #just so pecl is available easily
pecl7 install igbinary
wget -P /tmp/ https://s3.amazonaws.com/aws-refarch/wordpress/latest/bits/AmazonElastiCacheClusterClient-2.0.1-PHP70-64bit.tar.gz
tar -xf '/tmp/AmazonElastiCacheClusterClient-2.0.1-PHP70-64bit.tar.gz'
cp '/tmp/artifact/amazon-elasticache-cluster-client.so' /usr/lib64/php/7.0/modules/
if [ ! -f /etc/php-7.0.d/50-memcached.ini ]; then
    touch /etc/php-7.0.d/50-memcached.ini
fi
echo 'extension=igbinary.so;' >> /etc/php-7.0.d/50-memcached.ini
echo 'extension=/usr/lib64/php/7.0/modules/amazon-elasticache-cluster-client.so;' >> /etc/php-7.0.d/50-memcached.ini
The hostname of the public ALB http form (e.g. http://abdc-12345-xyz.<region>.elb.amazonaws.com)
[ Optional ] The main domain name of the WordPress site (e.g. example.com). Leave empty to use the ALB DNS name for the WordPress site.

#!/bin/bash -xe
# create hidden opcache directory locally & change owner to apache
if [ ! -d /var/www/.opcache ]; then                    
    mkdir -p /var/www/.opcache
fi
# enable opcache in /etc/php-7.0.d/10-opcache.ini
sed -i 's/;opcache.file_cache=.*/opcache.file_cache=\/var\/www\/.opcache/' /etc/php-7.0.d/10-opcache.ini
sed -i 's/opcache.memory_consumption=.*/opcache.memory_consumption=512/' /etc/php-7.0.d/10-opcache.ini
# download opcache-instance.php to verify opcache status
if [ ! -f /var/www/wordpress/${WPDirectory}/opcache-instanceid.php ]; then
    wget -P /var/www/wordpress/${WPDirectory}/ https://s3.amazonaws.com/aws-refarch/wordpress/latest/bits/opcache-instanceid.php
fi

[u'', [u'#!/bin/bash -xe
', u'
', u'# install wp-cli
', u'if [ ! -f /bin/wp/wp-cli.phar ]; then
', u'   curl -o /bin/wp https://raw.githubusercontent.com/wp-cli/builds/gh-pages/phar/wp-cli.phar
', u'   chmod +x /bin/wp
', u'fi
', u'
', u'# make site directory
', u'if [ ! -d /var/www/wordpress/', u'WPDirectory', u' ]; then
', u'   mkdir -p /var/www/wordpress/', u'WPDirectory', u'
', u'
', u'   cd /var/www/wordpress/', u'WPDirectory', u'
', u'   # install wordpress if not installed
', u'   # use public alb host name if wp domain name was empty
', u'   if ! $(wp core is-installed --allow-root); then
', u"       wp core download --version='", u'WPVersion', u"' --locale='", u'WPLocale', u"' --allow-root
", u"       wp core config --dbname='", u'DatabaseName', u"' --dbuser='", u'DatabaseMasterUsername', u"' --dbpass='", u'DatabaseMasterPassword', u"' --dbhost='", u'DatabaseClusterEndpointAddress', u"' --dbprefix=wp_ --allow-root
", u'       wp core install --url=', [u'NoWPDomainName', u'PublicAlbHostname', [u'', [u"'http://www.", u'WPDomainName', u"'"]]], u" --title='", u'WPTitle', u"' --admin_user='", u'WPAdminUsername', u"' --admin_password='", u'WPAdminPassword', u"' --admin_email='", u'WPAdminEmail', u"' --skip-email --allow-root
", u'       wp plugin install w3-total-cache
', u'       sed -i "/$table_prefix = 'wp_';/ a \define('WP_HOME', 'http://' . \$_SERVER['HTTP_HOST']); " /var/www/wordpress/', u'WPDirectory', u'/wp-config.php
', u'       sed -i "/$table_prefix = 'wp_';/ a \define('WP_SITEURL', 'http://' . \$_SERVER['HTTP_HOST']); " /var/www/wordpress/', u'WPDirectory', u'/wp-config.php
', u'       # enable HTTPS in wp-config.php if ACM Public SSL Certificate parameter was not empty
', [u'NoSslCertificate', [u'', [u'       sed -i "/$table_prefix = 'wp_';/ a \# No ACM Public SSL Certificate " /var/www/wordpress/', u'WPDirectory', u'/wp-config.php
']], [u'', [u'       sed -i "/$table_prefix = 'wp_';/ a \$_SERVER['HTTPS'] = 'on';" /var/www/wordpress/', u'WPDirectory', u'/wp-config.php
']]], u'
', u'       # set permissions of wordpress site directories
', u'       chown -R apache:apache /var/www/wordpress/', u'WPDirectory', u'
', u'       chmod u+wrx /var/www/wordpress/', u'WPDirectory', u'/wp-content/*
', u'       if [ ! -f /var/www/wordpress/', u'WPDirectory', u'/opcache-instanceid.php ]; then
', u'         wget -P /var/www/wordpress/', u'WPDirectory', u'/ https://s3.amazonaws.com/aws-refarch/wordpress/latest/bits/opcache-instanceid.php
', u'       fi
', u'   fi
', u'   RESULT=$?
', u'   if [ $RESULT -eq 0 ]; then
', u'       touch /var/www/wordpress/', u'WPDirectory', u'/wordpress.initialized
', u'         else
', u'       touch /var/www/wordpress/', u'WPDirectory', u'/wordpress.failed
', u'   fi
', u'fi
']]
